Action.author: christopherferris
Action.body: end-to-end (hence the e2e) is a hold-over term. basically, we had the e2e scenario in the fabric repo as a test that covered the entire lifecycle of deploying a network, deploying a trivial application (chaincode) and driving a few transactions before tearing it down. We still use this today. We turned it into a tutorial and it has grown arms and legs.
